<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/collections/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a specific collection by ID.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"Collection ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
